headline: Engineering Data Systems.
Solving Complex Problems.
Scaling Innovation.
profile.about: I am a Data Engineer with a Bachelor's in Information Systems and a deep passion for building scalable data architectures. Currently bridging the gap between engineering and advanced research as I embark on my Master's in Computer Science at the University of Sydney. Beyond 9-to-5, I help businesses automate their operations through custom-built engines.

timeline.title: Bachelor of Information Systems
timeline.description: Graduated with a strong foundation in database management, programming, and systems analysis.

timeline.title: Data Engineer
timeline.description: Led data pipeline optimization and architecture design for large-scale data processing.

timeline.title: Freelance Client: Business Automation
timeline.description: Developed an automated reconciliation engine to streamline financial data processing.

timeline.title: Master of Computer Science
timeline.description: Advancing research and technical expertise in the field of Computer Science.

projects.title: Automated Reconciliation Engine
projects.description: A high-performance engine built to automate the reconciliation of complex business transactions, reducing manual effort by 90%.

projects.title: Real-time Streaming Pipeline
projects.description: Scalable streaming architecture using Kafka and Spark for low-latency data processing and real-time dashboarding.

projects.title: DW Design & Optimization
projects.description: End-to-end data warehouse transformation, implementing star schema and optimizing query performance by 40%.
